caption:
This photograph captures an industrial scene dominated by dark, silhouette-like structures against a slightly brighter sky. The primary focus is on a large industrial facility, possibly a factory or plant, with several buildings featuring angular, metallic roofing. The roofs have a somewhat corrugated texture, suggesting they are made of metal.

On the right side of the image, a prominent smokestack extends into the sky, emitting a thick plume of orange and white smoke that contrasts starkly with the muted sky. The smoke is being carried by the wind, spreading horizontally across the upper part of the frame. 

The foreground is mostly shrouded in shadow, making it difficult to discern specific details. However, the darkness of the foreground sharply contrasts with the lighter sky, emphasizing the industrial silhouette. 

The overall mood conveyed by the image is gritty and somewhat somber, highlighting themes of industrialization and environmental impact. The photograph appears to be taken during either sunrise or sunset, given the soft light and color of the sky, adding a dramatic effect to the scene. The sky, tinged with hues of blue and pink, provides a natural backdrop that enhances the industrial elements without overpowering them.
title: U.s.  Steel plant emits red-orange smoke 24 hours a day
